## ResolutionTools.isPendingAddition() function

Checks if a resource ID corresponds to a pending addition.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isPendingAddition(resourceId: string, pendingResources: Map<string, ResourceJson.Json.ILooseResourceDecl>): boolean;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

resourceId


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Resource ID to check (should be full resource ID)


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

pendingResources


</td><td>

Map&lt;string, ResourceJson.Json.ILooseResourceDecl&gt;


</td><td>

Map of pending resources


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

boolean

True if the resource ID exists in pending resources

## Example


```typescript
if (isPendingAddition('platform.languages.az-AZ', pendingResources)) {
  console.log('This is a pending resource');
}
```
